articles.author: Hannah Ziegler
articles.title: Cyberattacks crippled thousands of car dealers. Here's what to know. - The Washington Post
articles.description: The cyberattacks on CDK Global led to a shutdown of sales, financing and payroll systems for many dealerships in North America.
articles.content:
Thousands of car dealers are struggling to do business this week because of two cyberattacks on an industry software provider.
The cyberattacks on CDK Global, which provides software to nearly 15,00… [+453 chars]
